remarks: Value of a complex number raised to a nonnegative integer power plus one.  Part of Definition 10-4.1 of [Gleason] p. 134.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)
statement:
expcld.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
expcld.2 $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN0 ) $.
expp1d $p |- ( ph -> ( A ^ ( N + 1 ) ) = ( ( A ^ N ) x. A ) ) $.
